name: Phonographic Performance Limited
goal: PPL is the UK-based collective management organisation (CMO) which represents tens of thousands of record companies and performers as regards the UK licensing of sound recordings for public performance and broadcast use, as well as offering an international service for the collection of similar monies from CMOs in other territories.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Enterprise, Information Society, Internal Market, Trade
euInitiatives:
EU Copyright Review
General Data Protection Regulation
Directive on Collective Rights Management
